he's attacked our NATO allies at times

he's attacked the whole cast of Hamilton
and Mailer Streep

the only person he seems unwilling to
want to criticise in any way is Vladimir

Putin we need a president who has the
guts to stand up to Vladimir Putin and

we are just not seeing that out of this
president advisers told him before I

picked up the phone explicitly in all

what did the president do I had a call
with President Putin and congratulated

him on the victory his electoral victory
Russia intervened in our presidential

election it was a historically close

through social media by pretending to be
Americans and among them they decided

that race was a really good issue to be
used to divide Americans President Putin

has clearly come to the conclusion
there's little price to play here this

is serious business
all of the intelligence chiefs agreed

Russia intervened there should be no
doubt that Russia perceived that it's

because the person United States cannot
even accept the fact that the Russians

intervened on his behalf I said it very
simply I think it could very well have

been Russia but I think it could well
have been other countries probably there

was meddling from other countries and
maybe other individuals he views it as a

threat to the legitimacy of his
presidency and it's leaving our country

exposed the United States announced
sanctions on Thursday against 19 Russian

individuals these sanctions are a good
step in the right direction but they

also don't go nearly far enough
the Kremlin said these sanctions were

expected they aren't that big of a deal
federal government is largely sitting on

its hands because this president views
any mention of Russia as a threat these

things are undeniable and we need to
confront them because they haven't

stopped we need to protect ourselves and
we need to deter the Russians from any

further involvement in our affair
this isn't a Democrat versus Republican

issue sadly this is a Donald Trump
versus all the rest of this issue
